Articles.Content:
Here I made a replica of a Soyuz rocket and spacecraft. I hope its near what it's like.

Its a one maned rocket. It has the perfect amount of fuel to go to my 200km high space station.

I use only procedural fairing, stretchy tanks and deadly reentry as mods. (mechJeb too, but only for the deltaV)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Roux_de_secours
